item.title: The Persistence of Memory
item.content: The Persistence of Memory is a famous surrealistic artwork created by Salvador Dali. It features melting clocks in a dreamlike landscape.

item.title: The Treachery of Images
item.content: The Treachery of Images is a renowned surrealist painting by René Magritte. It depicts a pipe with the inscription 'Ceci n'est pas une pipe,' which translates to 'This is not a pipe.'

item.title: The Elephants
item.content: The Elephants is a surrealist painting by Salvador Dali. It portrays a group of elephants with long, spindly legs.

item.title: The Son of Man
item.content: The Son of Man is a well-known surrealist painting by René Magritte. It shows a man in a bowler hat with an apple obscuring his face.

item.title: The Human Condition
item.content: The Human Condition is a surrealist painting by René Magritte. It features a canvas within a canvas depicting a mysterious scene.

item.title: The False Mirror
item.content: The False Mirror is a famous surrealist painting by René Magritte. It shows an eye with a cloud-filled sky reflected in it.

item.title: The Lovers
item.content: The Lovers is a surrealist painting by René Magritte. It depicts a man and a woman kissing, both of their faces covered by cloth.

item.title: The Red Tower
item.content: The Red Tower is a surrealist painting by Giorgio de Chirico. It shows an architectural landscape with a tower painted in vibrant red.

item.title: The Voice of Blood
item.content: The Voice of Blood is a surrealist painting by Salvador Dali. It features distorted figures and symbolic imagery.

item.title: The Portrait of Paul Eluard
item.content: The Portrait of Paul Eluard is a surrealist painting by Salvador Dali. It depicts the poet Paul Eluard with his face obscured by butterflies.

item.title: The Great Masturbator
item.content: The Great Masturbator is a surrealist painting by Salvador Dali. It portrays a distorted figure lying on a rock.

item.title: The Temptation of St. Anthony
item.content: The Temptation of St. Anthony is a surrealist painting by Salvador Dali. It depicts various surreal elements surrounding the figure of St. Anthony.

item.title: The Enigma of Hitler
item.content: The Enigma of Hitler is a surrealist painting by Salvador Dali. It explores the psychological dimensions of Adolf Hitler and the nature of evil.

item.title: The Madonna of Port Lligat
item.content: The Madonna of Port Lligat is a surrealist painting by Salvador Dali. It shows a religious depiction of the Virgin Mary with surreal elements.

item.title: The Swallow's Tail
item.content: The Swallow's Tail is a surrealist painting by Salvador Dali. It portrays a whirlpool-like structure with symbolic imagery.

item.title: The Burning Giraffe
item.content: The Burning Giraffe is a surrealist painting by Salvador Dali. It features a giraffe on fire with various symbolic elements.

item.title: The Disintegration of the Persistence of Memory
item.content: The Disintegration of the Persistence of Memory is a surrealist artwork by Salvador Dali. It is a reinterpretation of his famous piece 'The Persistence of Memory.'

item.title: The Sacrament of the Last Supper
item.content: The Sacrament of the Last Supper is a surrealist painting by Salvador Dali. It portrays the Last Supper scene with unique and surreal elements.

item.title: The Meditative Rose
item.content: The Meditative Rose is a surrealist painting by Salvador Dali. It depicts a rose with a face in a dreamlike setting.

item.title: The Hallucinogenic Toreador
item.content: The Hallucinogenic Toreador is a surrealist painting by Salvador Dali. It portrays a bullfight scene with various surreal elements and symbolism.
